title: Riot, please, Keep the OLD SUMMONERS RIFT
body:
Please, Riot.
The majority of the players have embraced the New Summoners Rift, but there are people who just want to play on the old one.
What harm is there to keep the old Summoners Rift?
People who like the New SR could play on it, while people who still like the Old SR could play on it too.
The Old SR brings many memories from Season 2-4 and it is too hard for us to lose.
Please, Riot.
KEEP THE OLD SUMMONERS RIFT

replies.body: 1. What I suggest is have the old SR as a separate queue or perhaps for gamemodes, since I certainly would hate to see it go, but I also doubt riot would ditch new sr after so much work into it, I just don't like the dota type of dark colours personally
leave rift as it is.. almost feels like we're playing a different game
If there is the old map, it shouldn't be something Riot does officially.
I've only been playing for 2 months and I already miss the old SR...{{champion:32}}

I guess if it was available in customs, then yes i would agree that would be fine by me.

But i prefer this new map anyway for many reasons. One of them is so i dont have to read as much qq about toaster performance

remember what {{champion:121}} always says!!

CHANGE IS GOOD
